characters.name: Cobalt Cloudhunter
characters.description: In The Official Movie Sourcebook.​[​specify​]​

characters.name: Flash Feather
characters.description: A baby Hippogriff that appears in My Little Pony The Movie merchandise. Has a toy figure.

characters.name: Flutter Cloud
characters.description: A baby Hippogriff that appears in My Little Pony The Movie merchandise. Has a toy figure.

characters.name: General Seaspray
characters.description: Appears in School Daze - Part 1 and School Daze - Part 2 as the general of Queen Novo's navy and Silverstream's royal escort. Also appears in A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and The Last Problem. He is a character in Gameloft's mobile game. His in-game description states, "A stalwart of Her Majesty Queen Novo's Royal Navy. Seaspray is the very model of an eagle-pony general. Just don't call him that to his face!" His name was previously used for a G1 Sea Pony and a G3 Earth pony mare and is similar to that of G1 Sea Pony Sea Spray. Voiced by Christopher Gaze.

characters.name: Silverstream
characters.description: Silverstream, or Silver Stream, is a female Hippogriff/seapony, Terramar's older sister, and one of the Young Six[3][4][5] who first appears in season eight of the show as a student at Twilight Sparkle's School of Friendship.

characters.name: Sky Beak
characters.description: Sky Beak and Ocean Flow are the respective Hippogriff and seapony parents of Silverstream and Terramar. Sky Beak first appears in School Daze - Part 2, and Ocean Flow first appears in Surf and or Turf.

characters.name:
Noble Hippogriff Guard
Stratus Skyranger
characters.description: A Hippogriff/seapony royal guard to Queen Novo in My Little Pony The Movie, The Stormy Road to Canterlot, and Gameloft's mobile game. Also appears on the subscription covers of My Little Pony: The Movie Prequel #1 (wing only) and #2. Has a toy figure. His design was reused for a seapony guard and the mobile game character "Charming Hippogriff".

characters.name: Terramar
characters.description: Terramar is a male Hippogriff/seapony and Silverstream's younger[1] brother who first appears as a supporting character in the season eight episode Surf and/or Turf.

characters.name: Vetera
characters.description: An ancient Hippogriff king mentioned in The Official Movie Sourcebook.

characters.name: Haven Bay
characters.description:
This is a list of non-pony characters in My Little Pony Friendship is Magic and associated media, including zebras, donkeys, dragons, and griffons. Official names are in bold. These names are mentioned in the show, in the comics, Hasbro's toy line, or stated by the show's crew. Names that are not in bold are placeholder names which are unofficial and are decided according to the placeholder names policy. Names in gray are up for vote. Colors and times are approximate.

  • How to add a character

characters.name: Queen Novo
characters.description: Queen Novo is a female seapony/Hippogriff who appears as a supporting character in My Little Pony The Movie and a minor character in the chapter books The Stormy Road to Canterlot and Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales. She also appears in the IDW comics and the episodes The Hearth's Warming Club and The Ending of the End - Part 2. She is the ruler of the kingdoms of Seaquestria and Hippogriffia and the mother of Princess Skystar.

characters.name: Princess Skystar
characters.description: Princess Skystar is a female seapony/Hippogriff who appears as a supporting character in My Little Pony The Movie and a central character in the chapter book Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales. She also makes minor appearances in the chapter book The Stormy Road to Canterlot and the season nine episode The Ending of the End - Part 2. She is the princess of the underwater kingdom of Seaquestria and the daughter of Queen Novo.

characters.name:
Regal Hippogriff
S08E06 Unnamed Male Hippogriff #10
characters.description: Appears in Surf and/or Turf as a resident of Mount Aris and Sky Beak's opponent in the "Glad to Be a Hippogriff" Festival games. Also appears in The Ending of the End - Part 2. He is a character named "Regal Hippogriff" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as an enemy minion during the "Convocation of the Creatures!" event. His bio states "This lordly Hippogriff prefers the skies to the seas -- that helmet and breastplate get REALLY heavy underwater."

characters.name:
Hippogriff Friendship Student
S08E06 Unnamed Male Baby Hippogriff #2
characters.description: Appears in Surf and/or Turf as a resident of Mount Aris and Seaquestria. Also appears in The Last Problem. He is a character named "Hippogriff Friendship Student" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss battle helper during the "Prank to the Future" event. His in-game description states "The School of Friendship's future student body consists of creatures of all kinds--including this little 'griff. Or is that 'seapony'?"
